creator: Linen Mobile, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Linen Wallet — use polygon blockchain with unbelievable ease.


INCREDIBLE SIMPLICITY

Have you ever wondered why all crypto wallets are so difficult to use? We have. That’s why Linen Wallet is built with our users in mind for the most user-friendly wallet experience.


OWN YOUR CRYPTO

Linen Wallet is non-custodial. All transactions happen directly on the blockchain, and we don’t have access to your assets in any way.


EASY WALLET RECOVERY

No need to write down a seed phrase anymore. One key is stored in your cloud, one in your mobile device, and one in Linen’s secure servers. Seamlessly recover your wallet using your cloud drive, email, and phone number.


BULLETPROOF SECURITY

Linen Wallet uses 3 keys, 2 of which are required to make a transaction. You lose one? You can still access your wallet. Someone steals one? They still can’t access it. Unlikely for you to lose the wallet, impractical for anyone else to access it. This is what makes Linen unique.


GNOSIS SAFE POWERED

Linen Wallet is powered by Gnosis Safe’s smart contract. With $86B of assets secured, it is the gold standard in crypto security. For years, crypto funds, whales, and DAOs have been using it. For the first time, Linen Wallet makes that technology accessible and easy to use for everyone.


THE HELP YOU NEED, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT

We care about you more than anything else. That’s why our support is always available. Always. Reach out to us at support@linen.app for support and feedback.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Miscellaneous UI improvements and bug fixes

title: Linen: Secure Polygon Wallet

creator: Linen Mobile, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
KEEP YOUR CRYPTO SAFE WITH LINEN WALLET

Exchange hacks, corrupted practices, and withdrawals halt. There are too many ways for your crypto to get lost on exchanges. Go self-custody and keep your crypto safe with Linen Wallet.


LINEN IS MORE SECURE THAN OTHER WALLETS

Most crypto wallets are secured with just one key. Linen Wallet is protected with 3 keys, and 2 of 3 are required to access your wallet. You lose one? You can still access your wallet. Someone steals one? They still can’t access it. Unlikely for you to lose the wallet, impractical for anyone else to access it. This is what makes Linen unique.


PROTECT YOUR CRYPTO AS CRYPTO FUNDS DO

Linen Wallet is powered by Gnosis Safe’s smart contract. With $40B of assets secured, it is the gold standard in crypto security. For years, crypto funds, whales, and DAOs have been using it. With Linen Wallet, everyone has now access to the same security with a simple app.


THE HELP YOU NEED, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT

We care about you more than anything else. That’s why our support is always available. Always. Reach out to us at support@linen.app for support and feedback.


BACKED & FUNDED BY OUR USERS

Our users are our top priority and they know that. That’s why Linen is backed and funded by its users—more than 5000 community members who invested $4.9M in the company via Republic. Linen is also backed by top crypto venture funds, including Coinbase Ventures, Polychain Capital, and HashKey.


EASY WALLET RECOVERY

No need to write down complicated phrases anymore. One key is stored in your cloud, one in your mobile device, and one in Linen’s secure servers. Seamlessly recover your wallet using your cloud drive, email, and phone number.


INCREDIBLE SIMPLICITY

Securing crypto the right way has always been complicated. This is no longer the case. Linen Wallet is built with our users in mind for the most user-friendly wallet experience. Multisig has never been easier.
descriptionShort: Linen Wallet (Beta) — use Polygon & Ethereum blockchains with unbelievable ease.

Create an Ethereum wallet and secure your assets with multiple keys to eliminate a single point of failure!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’ve added Gnosis Chain support!
Also, fixed an issue with recovery for old wallets.

title: Linen: Secure Crypto Wallet

creator: Linen Mobile, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Linen Wallet users are protected by the Safe technology used by large crypto holders. Over $35 billion in crypto assets is stored in Safe blockchain accounts.

WHAT IS THE SAFE TECHNOLOGY, YOU ASK?
The Safe technology allows you to decouple your blockchain account (address) from keys that are used to sign transactions on the blockchain. This is also called account abstraction powered by a Safe multisig. Linen Wallet creates a blockchain account (wallet address) and 3 keys for each user account. 2 of 3 keys are required to move assets. One key is located on a user’s mobile device, the second key is located on a user’s cloud drive and the third key (recovery key) is secured by Linen. No single key can access your assets.

WHY SAFER, YOU ASK?
Most crypto wallets are secured with just one key. Linen Wallet is protected with three keys, and two of those three are required to access your wallet. You lose one? You can still access your wallet. Someone steals one? They still can't access it. This is what makes Linen unique.

WHY EASIER, YOU ASK?
Seamlessly recover your wallet using your cloud drive, email, and phone number.

ZERO FEES ON POLYGON AND GNOSIS CHAIN
Users of Linen Wallet do not need to pay network fees on Polygon and Gnosis Safe. We pay them for you to make the DeFi and Web3 user experience more pleasant.

SELF-CUSTODIAL
Linen Wallet is a user self-custody wallet. This means that users control their private keys and we, as a wallet app, can’t access your funds in any way. Users on iOS can enter Sovereign mode where they can use third-party interfaces to access their wallets.

GNOSIS SAFE POWERED
Linen Wallet is powered by Gnosis Safe’s smart contract. With $35B of assets secured, it is the gold standard in crypto security. For years, crypto funds, whales, and DAOs have been using it. For the first time, Linen Wallet makes that technology accessible and easy to use for everyone.

CONNECT TO YOUR FAVORITE BLOCKCHAIN APPS
Safely connect Linen Wallet to decentralized applications using WalletConnect.

MULTI-CHAIN
Store, send, and swap assets on the Ethereum, Polygon and Gnosis blockchains.

THE HELP YOU NEED, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT
We care about you more than anything else. That's why our support is always available. Always. Reach out to us at support@linen.app for support and feedback.
descriptionShort: Multisig wallet on Ethereum, Polygon, Gnosis Chain — your safe for Web3 & DeFi

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are excited to announce that in this version, we have implemented WalletConnect protocol v1 and v2 together with ERC-1271 smart contract signatures support! This update will allow you to connect Linen Wallet to external DApps through Wallet Connect.

title: Linen: Safe Crypto DeFi Wallet

creator: Linen Mobile, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Linen Wallet users are protected by the Safe technology used by large crypto holders. Over $35 billion in crypto assets is stored in Safe blockchain accounts.

WHAT IS THE SAFE TECHNOLOGY, YOU ASK?
The Safe technology allows you to decouple your blockchain account (address) from keys that are used to sign transactions on the blockchain. This is also called account abstraction powered by a Safe multisig. Linen Wallet creates a blockchain account (wallet address) and 3 keys for each user account. 2 of 3 keys are required to move assets. One key is located on a user’s mobile device, the second key is located on a user’s cloud drive and the third key (recovery key) is secured by Linen. No single key can access your assets.

WHY SAFER, YOU ASK?
Most crypto wallets are secured with just one key. Linen Wallet is protected with three keys, and two of those three are required to access your wallet. You lose one? You can still access your wallet. Someone steals one? They still can't access it. This is what makes Linen unique.

WHY EASIER, YOU ASK?
Seamlessly recover your wallet using your cloud drive, email, and phone number.

ZERO FEES ON POLYGON AND GNOSIS CHAIN
Users of Linen Wallet do not need to pay network fees on Polygon and Gnosis Safe. We pay them for you to make the DeFi and Web3 user experience more pleasant.

SELF-CUSTODIAL
Linen Wallet is a user self-custody wallet. This means that users control their private keys and we, as a wallet app, can’t access your funds in any way. Users on iOS can enter Sovereign mode where they can use third-party interfaces to access their wallets.

GNOSIS SAFE POWERED
Linen Wallet is powered by Gnosis Safe’s smart contract. With $35B of assets secured, it is the gold standard in crypto security. For years, crypto funds, whales, and DAOs have been using it. For the first time, Linen Wallet makes that technology accessible and easy to use for everyone.

CONNECT TO YOUR FAVORITE BLOCKCHAIN APPS
Safely connect Linen Wallet to decentralized applications using WalletConnect.

MULTI-CHAIN
Store, send, and swap assets on the Ethereum, Polygon and Gnosis blockchains.

THE HELP YOU NEED, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT
We care about you more than anything else. That's why our support is always available. Always. Reach out to us at support@linen.app for support and feedback.

Users of Linen Wallet do not need to pay network fees on Polygon and Gnosis Safe. We pay them for you to make the DeFi and Web3 user experience more pleasant.

SELF-CUSTODIAL
Linen Wallet is a user self-custody wallet. This means that users control their private keys and we, as a wallet app, can’t access your funds in any way. Users on iOS can enter Sovereign mode where they can use third-party interfaces to access their wallets.

GNOSIS SAFE POWERED
Linen Wallet is powered by Gnosis Safe’s smart contract. With $35B of assets secured, it is the gold standard in crypto security. For years, crypto funds, whales, and DAOs have been using it. For the first time, Linen Wallet makes that technology accessible and easy to use for everyone.

CONNECT TO YOUR FAVORITE BLOCKCHAIN APPS
Safely connect Linen Wallet to decentralized applications using WalletConnect.

MULTI-CHAIN
Store, send, and swap assets on the Ethereum, Polygon and Gnosis blockchains.

THE HELP YOU NEED, WHENEVER YOU NEED IT
We care about you more than anything else. That's why our support is always available. Always. Reach out to us at support@linen.app for support and feedback.
descriptionShort: Multisig wallet on Ethereum, Polygon, Gnosis Chain — your safe for Web3 & DeFi

• Minor bug fixes and improvements

title: Linen: Safe Crypto DeFi Wallet

creator: Linen Mobile, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Linen Wallet users are protected by the Safe technology used by large crypto holders. Over $35 billion in crypto assets is stored in Safe blockchain accounts.

WHAT IS THE SAFE TECHNOLOGY, YOU ASK?
The Safe technology allows you to decouple your blockchain account (address) from keys that are used to sign transactions on the blockchain. This is also called account abstraction powered by a Safe multisig. Linen Wallet creates a blockchain account (wallet address) and 3 keys for each user account. 2 of 3 keys are required to move assets. One key is located on a user’s mobile device, the second key is located on a user’s cloud drive and the third key (recovery key) is secured by Linen. No single key can access your assets.

WHY SAFER, YOU ASK?
Most crypto wallets are secured with just one key. Linen Wallet is protected with three keys, and two of those three are required to access your wallet. You lose one? You can still access your wallet. Someone steals one? They still can't access it. This is what makes Linen unique.

WHY EASIER, YOU ASK?
Seamlessly recover your wallet using your cloud drive, email, and phone number.

ZERO FEES ON POLYGON AND GNOSIS CHAIN
Users of Linen Wallet do not need to pay network fees on Polygon and Gnosis Safe. We pay them for you to make the DeFi and Web3 user experience more pleasant.

SELF-CUSTODIAL

GNOSIS SAFE POWERED
Linen Wallet is powered by Gnosis Safe’s smart contract. With $35B of assets secured, it is the gold standard in crypto security. For years, crypto funds, whales, and DAOs have been using it. For the first time, Linen Wallet makes that technology accessible and easy to use for everyone.

CONNECT TO YOUR FAVORITE BLOCKCHAIN APPS
Safely connect Linen Wallet to decentralized applications using WalletConnect.

MULTI-CHAIN
